author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CTG Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.03
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Computer Task Group Inc:
* CTG REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.06 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.03 * Q4 REVENUE $74.6 MILLION VERSUS $77.5 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $340 MILLION TO $360 MILLION * SEES 2018 GAAP EPS OF $0.25-$0.37
* ‍EXPECTS 2018 GAAP EPS OF $0.25-$0.37​
* SEES 2018 NON-GAAP EPS OF $0.30-$0.42
* SEES Q1 2018 ‍REVENUE $77 TO $82 MILLION​ * COMPUTER TASK GROUP - RECOGNIZED $0.11 PER DILUTED SHARE, NON-CASH CHARGE RELATED TO NEW U.S. TAX LAW IN QUARTER
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP ‍DILUTED EPS $0.05 TO $0.07​
* SEES ‍Q1 DILUTED EPS $0.02 TO $0.04​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
